data.name: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator - Cardboard Pickup Mechanic (Papercraft)
data.detailed_description:
Cardboard Pickup Mechanic DLC is packed with digital concept arts, sketches, and cardboard papercraft pickup truck schemes.

Take a ride into the world of diesel and discover how the game has been brought to life! Peek behind the graphic design process of the diesel-drinking machines from the game. Print your own diesel trucks, customize them, and put on display!

DLC includes:
  • Papercraft pickup truck schemes
  • Concept arts
  • Sketches
data.about_the_game:
Cardboard Pickup Mechanic DLC is packed with digital concept arts, sketches, and cardboard papercraft pickup truck schemes.

Take a ride into the world of diesel and discover how the game has been brought to life! Peek behind the graphic design process of the diesel-drinking machines from the game. Print your own diesel trucks, customize them, and put on display!

DLC includes:

  • Concept arts
  • Sketches
data.short_description: Grab free vehicle parts for Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator. Offer available for a limited time. Hurry up!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
